The length of the entrapped air in the vertical position is less than that in the horizontal position
The length of the mercury column becomes shorter in the horizontal position than in the vertical position

The pressure of the entrapped air is atmospheric in both cases.

question: Which of the following motions will be produced by a pair of equal, opposite and non-collinear parallel forces acting on a body?
explanation: A couple consists of two equal and opposite forces acting at a separation, so that net force becomes zero. When a couple acts on a body it rotates the body but does not produce any translational motion. Hence, only rotational motion is produced.

chain vibrates in resonance with the tanker’s engine
heat generated by friction in the engine is conducted to the earth

question: A transformer is required to give 120V from a 240V mains supply. If the primary has 5500 turns, how many turns has the secondary?

question: Water in an open container boils at a lower temperature when heated at the top of a mountain than at sea-level because at the top of a mountain

the saturation vapour pressure of water is higher than at sea-level
